title: Counter.Strike.Source-FULL-2013.Latest.Stable.v80-AUTOUPDATE
description:
Counter-Strike: Source

Protocol version 24
Exe version 1807769 (cstrike)
Exe build: 19:53:34 Jun 18 2013 (5337) (240)


To install - Install DAEMON Tools: http://www.disc-tools.com/download/daemon and open the ISO file
1. Run the file Counter-Strike-Source.v80.exe
2. Follow the instructions

If you need to update in the future please run the CSS-Updater.exe again and it will update your game automatically.

If you want to change the language,go to the game folder,find the file rev.ini,open it with notepad and edit the following line :


Language = English 


(change it to any of the languages listed below)
